decks.notes: This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on utilizing powerful low-cost creatures and burn spells to quickly defeat the opponent. The key strategy involves rapid deployment of threats like Tarmogoyf and Monastery Swiftspear while supporting them with efficient removal like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart. Mishra's Bauble and Abundant Harvest provide card advantage and consistency, while Underworld Breach offers graveyard recursion. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an extra layer of synergy and flexibility to the deck. This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle.

This deck aims to quickly ramp up mana to cast Primeval Titan and trigger its ability multiple times in a turn, fetching lands such as Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and The Mycosynth Gardens to deal massive amounts of damage to the opponent. With the help of cards like Amulet of Vigor and Dryad of the Ilysian Grove, the deck can generate a large amount of mana and play multiple lands per turn, allowing for explosive combos and overwhelming board presence. Additionally, cards like Tolaria West and Expedition Map help tutor for key lands to further enable the combo.

The key concept of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly cast low-cost spells to build up prowess triggers on Dragon's Rage Channeler and Monastery Swiftspear, while also utilizing Slickshot Show-Off and Soul-Scar Mage to deal damage and control the board. The deck also features a combo with Underworld Breach to repeatedly cast spells from the graveyard. Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration help dig for key cards, while Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat provide removal and burn to finish off opponents. Jegantha, the Wellspring serves as a companion to provide additional mana acceleration.
